error_patterns.description: Indeed platform timeout after 30s with networkidle wait strategy
error_patterns.context: Real browser E2E test - Playwright automation
error_patterns.root_cause: Indeed employs aggressive bot detection; networkidle wait strategy too strict
error_patterns.solution: Changed wait_until to 'domcontentloaded', increased timeout to 60s, added graceful error handling
error_patterns.prevention: Always use domcontentloaded for bot-heavy sites, implement timeout error handling
